content:
I am currently working on PR: #21454.
I have changed the way content in user group card looks.
This is what it looks like: Screenshot-2022-03-18-at-20.18.43.png
Here the text alignment of group name and description is justifywhich makes the spacing between the words inconsistent.
I am thinking of making it look like the way Stream settings looks: Screenshot-2022-03-18-at-20.20.59.png
We can place the buttons in the same line as of Group name and place the description in the next line.
We can also remove -between the name and description.
Please share your feedbacks on this.
Yes, I think moving description to next line is better.

I think that's probably a useful step, though I'll note that we do not intend for user groups to have long descriptions, so the screenshot is kinda misleading. In general I want to do a more holistic redesign of the user groups setting UI to perhaps be more similar to the two-panel "Stream settings" UI, so I don't want to necessarily go too deep into tweaking the current system.

I guess in particular:

  • We want to be able to browse user groups using filters etc. like our other table-based components.
  • We want the set of members for user groups to be browsable like stream subscribers.
  • We want to be able to support multiple screens worth of user group settings, such as a list of permissions the group has.
  • We want to be able to browse subgroups.

I have updated the PR.
Following screenshots show how the user groups cards look in both long and short description after the changes.
Screenshot-2022-03-19-at-02.55.14.png Screenshot-2022-03-19-at-03.04.50.png
